Sudijska ekspertiza: Čisti crveni kartoni za Inđiju, bio je penal za Javor
Kao i za Partizan protiv Vojvodine

04 Nov 2019

Navikli smo, posle svakog kola u Superligi, da se najviše priča o arbitraži na mečevima večitih rivala. Međutim, posle ovog vikenda žiža je prebačena u Inđiju. Sigurno ste pročitali da su ekipa iz Srema i Javor odigrli vrlo uzbudljiv meč, te da je ozbiljnu ulogu imao i glavni sudija Bojan Nikolić.
Mladi arbitar je isključio dvojicu igrača Inđije, a potom je u 90. minutu dosudio penal za Javor. Bio je to povod za domaće igrače, da na kratko, napuste teren. Posle meča oglasila se i uprava Inđije saopštenjem za javnost na zvaničnom sajtu kluba.
Međutim, sudijska ekspretiza na televiziji Arena pokazala je da ljudi iz Inđije nisu imali razloga za toliko ljutnju.
Da krenemo redom. Prvo je isključen Srđan Dimitrov.„Ovde je sve apsolutno jasno. Pesnica u lice, ili prema licu, protivnika. Sudija je u tom momentu bio okrenut na drugu stranu, jer je merio daljinu živog zida“, poručio je sudijski ekspret Igor Radojičićtokom gostovanja na televiziji Arena.
Vruće je bilo i u 75. minutu.Tada je žestoko startovao vezista domaćih Nemanja Bosančić.„Bespotreban start, u trenucima kada je igrač Javora želeo domaćima da vrati loptu. Jeste daleko od gola, nema opasnosti, ali to je start otvorenom nogom. Sve je jasno“.
I na kraju 90. minut. Detalj koji je inicirao kraći prekid. Centrirao je Miroslav Marić, jedan od defanzivaca Inđije je visoko podigao ruku. I pogrešio.„Vidite da je ruka u neprirodnom položaju, i da postoji taj trzaj. Sudija Nikolić je bio odlično postavljen“, objasnio je Radojičić i dodao da na drugoj strani nisu bili penali.
Zanimljiva je bila i jedna situacija sa stadiona u Humskoj. Polemisalo se mnogo o detalju koji je prethodio jedanestercu za Partizan i vodećem golu Bibrasa Natha.„Pogledajte ovo. Sudija prilazi igračima i jasno im stavlja do znanja da neće tolerisati povlačenje. Ovaj start nad Ostojićem je bio najslabijeg intenziteta, ali imajući sve u vidu ovo je penal“, poručio je Radojičić.

Referee's expertise: Pure red cards for Indjija, was a penalty for Javor
As for Partizan v. Vojvodina

04 Nov 2019

We are used to, after every SuperLeague round, the most talked about arbitrage in eternal rivals' matches. However, after this weekend the focus was transferred to Indjija. You must have read that the team from Srem and Javor played a very exciting match, and that the referee Bojan Nikolic played a serious role.
The young arbiter ruled out two Indjija players and then awarded Javor a penalty in the 90th minute. It was an occasion for the home players to briefly leave the field. After the match, the Indjija administration made a press release on the club's official website.
However, the judge's broadcast on Arena television showed that the Indjija people had no reason to be so angry.
Let's go in order. First, Srdjan Dimitrov was excluded. "Everything is absolutely clear here. Fist in the face, or face, of the opponent. At that moment, the judge was turned to the other side, because he was measuring the distance of the living wall, "said the judge's express, Igor Radojicic, during his appearance on Arena television.
It was hot in the 75th minute too. Then the home midfielder Nemanja Bosancic started fiercely. You are far from naked, there is no danger, but it is an open leg start. Everything is clear".
And finally the 90th minute. The detail that initiated the brief interruption. Centered by Miroslav Maric, one of Indjija's defenders raised his hand high. And you are wrong. "You see that the arm is in an unnatural position, and there is that jerk. Judge Nikolic was well appointed, ”Radojicic explained, adding that there were no penalties on the other side.
One situation from the stadium in Humskaya was also interesting. There was much controversy over the detail that preceded the Partizan single and the leading goal by Bibras Nath. "Look at this. The referee approaches the players and makes it clear that they will not tolerate withdrawal. This start over Ostojic was of the lowest intensity, but keeping in mind this is a penalty, ”Radojicic said.
